name: ELSA
description:
Stop the pollution in space from destroying our satellites and space crafts!

The rising amount of space debris is dangerous to current and future space shuttles, stations, and satellites that we depend on every day. Use ELSA, a revolving space cleaner, to protect the roaming satellites and space shuttle from the flying space trash around Earth before time is up! 

PLAY IN FULL SCREEN MODE FOR OPTIMUM PLAYABILITY .

Game produced by Serena Zhang, Aaron Soto, and Ian Kraft  in Arizona State University's Walter Cronkite School of Journalism and Mass Communication's New Media Innovation and Entrepreneurship Lab.
